name: Panther Superhero Crime City
description:
The city is in a state of great disturbance. The villains, gangsters, monsters and other evil forces are out there in the city. They have captured many civilians. Peoples are very frightened. Everyone is praying for incredible super hero to save them. Be a real Super Hero, take final revenge from these evil forces, and save all the people from evil Monsters and Gangsters, and become a Mighty Legend in this new and action packed “Panther Superhero Crime City” fighting game.

“Panther Superhero Crime City” is a new fighting game with stunning HD graphics, detailed 3d city environment, realistic sound effects and smooth gameplay. In this game, your duty is to fight with gangster and other Monsters and save the civilians from these evils. Be careful of your health and time in the missions, defeat the Monsters in the given time. There are lots of challenging missions. Be an active part of Super Heroes fighting force and let the glory be yours.

Key Features:
• Smooth and Easy controls
• Detailed beautiful city environment
• Challenging Fighting missions
• Select your Favorite Hero
• Realistic Sound Effects
• 100% free
